page.title: 01SCHOOLS
page.content: THERE ARE FOUR PRIMARY SCHOOLS IN OUR AREA. OUR SCHOOL IS CALLED 'BALMORAL' AND SERVES A HOUSING ESTATE OF THE SAME NAME. THE SCHOOL ROLL IS GROWING AS THE HOUSES ARE BEING MODERNISED AND FAMILIES ARE MOVING INTO THE AREA. THE OLDEST SCHOOL IS 'THE BURGH' WHICH IS ALREADY ONE HUNDRED YEARS OLD. ANOTHER SCHOOL SERVING A HOUSING ESTATE IS ON THE OPPOSITE SIDE OF THE TOWN AND IS CALLED'GLENDINNING TERRACE'.THESE THREE SCHOOLS ARE ALL NON-DENOMINATIONAL SO SERVE THE HOUSES AROUND THE SCHOOL.THE ONE OTHER SCHOOL IS ST.MARGARET'S WHICH IS A CATHOLIC SCHOOL SO ITS CATCHMENT AREA IS THE WHOLE OF THE TOWN AS WELL AS THE VILLAGES AND TOWNS NEARBY.IT IS THE ONE BUILDING WHICH WAS BUILT SINCE 1970.ALL THESE SCHOOLS HAVE LADIES AS THEIR HEADTEACHERS.
